metadata.title: RHSA-2023:6341: xorg-x11-server-Xwayland security, bug fix, and enhancement update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
Xwayland is an X server for running X clients under Wayland.

The following packages have been upgraded to a later upstream version: xorg-x11-server-Xwayland (22.1.9). (BZ#2158761)

Security Fix(es):

* xorg-x11-server: X.Org Server Overlay Window Use-After-Free Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability (CVE-2023-1393)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9.3 Release Notes linked from the References section.

bugzilla.text: X.Org Server Overlay Window Use-After-Free Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
xorg-x11-server-Xwayland is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
